title: Signal Function Block
description: This function block processes an input signal and generates an output based on time intervals. It calculates a step value based on the system time and the provided time interval, and uses it to modify the output signal.
name: SIGNAL

input.name: IN
input.description: A boolean input indicating whether an alarm is present.

input.name: SIG
input.description: A byte input representing a signal value that will be combined with the calculated step.

input.name: TS
input.description: A time input to determine the interval for the step calculation.

output.name: Q
output.description: A boolean output indicating the result of the signal processing.
